title: The After Show Talks About the End of Nat Sherman
itunes:title: The After Show Talks About the End of Nat Sherman
description:
This week, we talk about the history of Nat Sherman, and how it got to where it is today. There’s also some speculation about what Michael Herklots may do next.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
